Articles.Content:
Here you the Arrow!

![841EDD94083B9C32272086DAA6DE401614ABDE12](http://images.akamai.steamusercontent.com/ugc/447331389949525100/841EDD94083B9C32272086DAA6DE401614ABDE12/)

![F5DE026F90920130D162B3CAC8299A83D58A6D1B](http://images.akamai.steamusercontent.com/ugc/447331389949524680/F5DE026F90920130D162B3CAC8299A83D58A6D1B/)

A little simmetrical shuttle, orbit capable to ferry your crew in orbit or stations.

Comes with launch system (mantain a low trayectory!) and an emergency parachute (never used but security is never enought with Jeb in command!! ![:confused:](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_huh.gif))

Be careful to not have a too short traiectory on reentry, it's better to sligtly overshoot and turn back later.. Tested in 1.0.4.

Enjoy!

[https://www.dropbox.com/s/jd8v2o8k0rfr2m5/Arrow%20%20%28100%25%20stock%29.craft?dl=0](https://www.dropbox.com/s/jd8v2o8k0rfr2m5/Arrow%20%20%28100%25%20stock%29.craft?dl=0)
I see you got bitten by the Dyna-Soar bug as well
